title: Pixel 5 Mic Problem in Whatsapp
content:
Hey Guys, 
iÂ´m a bit frustrated with my Pixel 5 right now. 
It seems to have problem when using the voice record feature in Whatsapp. (which i use a lot)
It does work, but my voice is very quite and the quality is bad.

Must be a software thing tho since the microphones on my device are totally fine when using other applications such as video recordings / Calls /...

Anyone got the same problem or even better a solution for this?
Thx
